Methods of Work 

     "By visiting the people, talking, praying, sympathizing with them, you will win hearts. This is the highest missionary work that you can do. . . . Find access to the people in whose neighborhood you live. As you tell them of the truth, use words of Christlike sympathy. . . . Show no impatience. Utter not one unkind word. Let the love of Christ be in your hearts, the law of kindness on your lips."--Id., pp. 40,41.
